attributes.action: Removal of LED headlights in motor vehicles
attributes.additional_details: I want Parliament to action this to prevent nervousness and danger to public safety. The Headlights are more efficient for power usage and are more economically friendly however they cause more danger to other road users due to their dazzling nature, especially when they are not dipped. Additionally, they look to be more like high beams than your standard nightime headlights which indicates rhat full beams may be fully blinding to other road users
attributes.background: More LED headlights are being used on the road. These LED headlights are very dazzling to other drivers causing heightened risk and nervousness in drivers. I want these headlights banned from use or updating legislation to prevent them from dazzling other drivers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Ban LED vehicle headlights or regulate bulb wattage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744882
